title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.8 - Psychologist fees for hearing purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.8 - Psychologist fees for hearing purposes

State Regulations
A psychologist who testifies at hearings or examines
claimants or participates in examination for evidential material for
compensation case hearings purposes only, without treatment, may accept fees
for such services from the claimant, employer or carrier requesting the
examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
331.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
